title: CONTROLLED ACCESS ENTRY, PET FRIENDLY, EXTRA STORAGE AVAILABLE
posting_body: ['Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 64', 'OR Text', '64', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Welcome Home!', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 381 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Lock Vista connects vintage details with modern touches and thoughtful amenities– all within reach of a lively community, the best of restaurants and retail, and Pacific Northwest parks.', 'Features', '- NEWLY REMODELED WITH MODERN/VINTAGE CHARM', '- ORIGINAL OAK HARDWOOD FLOORS', '- EXTRA STORAGE AVAILABLE', '- SPACIOUS STUDIO, ONE-, AND TWO-BEDROOM HOMES', '- TILE BACKSPLASH', '- GRANITE COUNTERTOPS', 'Community Amenities', '- LUSH GREEN SPACES', '- ACCESS TO MAJOR METRO LINES AND BURKE GILMAN', 'TRAIL', '- RESIDENT CLUBHOUSE WITH KITCHEN', '- CONTROLLED ACCESS ENTRY', '- PET FRIENDLY', '- SHIMMERING SEASONAL POOL', '- ON-SITE LAUNDRY FACILITIES', '- RESERVED PARKING AVAILABLE', '- FITNESS CENTER', 'Driving Directions', 'Directions: From I-5: exit NE 45th', 'St , head west toward Ballard, slight right at N Midvale Place.', 'N Midvale Place turns into N 46th Street.', 'Continue on North 46th Street.', 'North 46th Street turns into Market Street.', 'Continue on NW Market Street.', 'Lock Vista will be on your left.', 'During our community upgrade we offer parking for all future residents, this is located near the Leasing Office and Pool and marked as Future Resident Parking.', 'For all active residents we offer reserved parking at an additional cost.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Lock Vista apartments for rent in Seattle, Washington welcomes your pet!', 'We are a pet-friendly community offering plenty of space for your pet to run and play.', 'We are in close proximity to Canine Happy Hour, DJOG - Seattle Dog Runners, Fantastic Dog and Cat Sitting, and Woodland Park off-leash area.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'For further details, please contact our leasing office.', 'Your pets will love it here!', 'b6BJhTkLZd']
